name: spimev
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Distinct-variable version of ~ spime . (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.)
